title: Motion: This House would mandate open-source governance for frontier AI models.
topic: Motion: This House would mandate open-source governance for frontier AI models.

events.content: Motion: This House would mandate open-source governance for frontier AI models.
Government-mandated openness improves safety auditing, democratizes innovation, and prevents a few labs from hoarding capabilities that shape society.
Full openness risks proliferation of weaponizable systems, weakens incentives to invest billions in safety research, and ignores the role of accountable licensing.
